articles.title: Apple fails to delay sales ban on watches. Only Biden can step in. - Business Insider
articles.description: US regulators ruled in October that Apple violated patent rights  of a medical technology company. Apple could avoid a ban if President Joe Biden steps in, but that's highly unlikely, experts say.
articles.content: Apple's attempt to delay a US sales ban on its Series 9 and Ultra 2 watches was rejected by regulators on Wednesday, leaving the chance to reverse the ban up to President Joe Biden.In October, the US… [+2334 chars]

articles.title: First ever mental images extracted from human brain using AI have been shown - Supercar Blondie
articles.description: Researchers in Japan have developed a "brain decoding technology", leveraging AI to translate human brain activity into mental images of objects and landscapes.
